DOC.brief_summary: This multicenter , non-randomized , single arm , retrospective study GORE® VIABAHN® Endoprosthesis treatment Popliteal Artery Aneurysm ( PAA ) .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation GORE® VIABAHN® Endoprosthesis Popliteal Artery Aneurysm
DOC.detailed_description: The primary objective evaluate safety efficacy GORE® VIABAHN® Endoprosthesis treatment subject Popliteal Artery Aneurysms . The study population include subject asymptomatic aneurysm ( ≥ 2 cm diameter ) popliteal artery , symptomatic aneurysm ( diameter requirement ) popliteal artery , presence mural thrombus ( diameter requirement ) popliteal artery treat GORE® VIABAHN® Endoprosthesis January 1 , 2002 December 31 , 2010 . Starting recently treat within date range , patient meet Inclusion/Exclusion enrol , minimum 50 subject adequate follow determine primary endpoint 12 month provide .
DOC.criteria: Received GORE® VIABAHN® Endoprosthesis January 1 , 2002 December 31 , 2010 treat popliteal artery aneurysm ; Had asymptomatic aneurysm ( ≥ 2 cm diameter ) popliteal artery , symptomatic aneurysm ( diameter requirement ) popliteal artery , presence mural thrombus ( diameter requirement ) popliteal artery ; Was 18 year age older ; Had elective popliteal artery aneurysm procedure . Bilateral popliteal artery aneurysms initial treatment day Had previous surgery popliteal artery aneurysm study limb
